articles.author: Fenit Nirappil
articles.title: Diabetes and obesity rising in young Americans, study finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: The alarming development increases the risk for heart disease.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
Diabetes and obesity are rising among young adults in the United States, an alarming development that puts them at higher risk for heart disease, according to a study of 13,000… [+3866 chars]
